frameDefinitions: An Agent who is engaged in an Undertaking accords a Degree of importance to a Consideration that influences the success of an Undertaking.
In this frame a Traveler goes on a journey, an activity, generally planned in advance, in which the Traveler moves from a Source location to a Goal along a Path or within an Area.
An Agent prepares for an Activity. '' 'The troops were preparing themselves for the mission.'
An Agent changes a Part of a complex entity with regard to some Feature in order to achieve some Imposed_purpose affected by the Feature.
This Frame is concerned with evaluating an Evaluee as being suitable for a Purpose or a User, presupposing some choice that is being made about which Evaluee to use for the Purpose or User.
An Agent adjusts an Instrument to enable it to interact directly with a difficult-to-access Target_location.
frameExamples: Our company <t>emphasizes</t> marketing tried and true products and services.INI
Ellen <t>journeyed</t> to Europe with five suitcases.
The troops were <t>preparing</t> themselves for the mission.
I need to <t>adjust</t> the thermostat to around 80 degrees when she visits.
(1) We need to build more houses <t>suitable</t> for local residents.
If you <t>aim</t> your weapons somewhere else , I 'll be more likely to talk .
listRoleDefinitions: An event or state of affairs, an attribute, or an entity whose properties have the potential to influence the success of the <fen>Agent</fen>'s <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The <fen>Agent</fen> is the individual who devotes time, concentration, or other resources to a <fen>Consideration</fen> that is important for the success of a larger <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The <fen>Competing_consideration</fen> is another factor that is relevant to the <fen>Undertaking</fen> to which the <fen>Agent</fen> devotes less attention or effort.
The <fen>Artifact</fen> is a physical object designed with some <fen>Consideration</fen> in mind, such that it functions to facilitate the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The <fen>Action</fen> is performed with importance placed on the <fen>Consideration</fen>.
The time period during which the <fen>Agent</fen> attaches a specified degree of importance to the <fen>Consideration</fen> to further the success of the <fen>Undertaking</fen>.
The location in which the <fen>Agent</fen> attaches the specified level of importance  to the <fen>Consideration</fen>.

This is the <fen>Area</fen> in which the traveling takes place. This frame element describes the enclosed area inside which travelling, of unspecified <fen>Source</fen>, <fen>Path</fen> or <fen>Goal</fen> takes place.
The <fen>Goal</fen> is the location where the travelers end up.
The <fen>Path</fen> is the route along which the travel takes place.
This is the living being which travels. Normally, the <fen>Traveler</fen> is expressed as an external argument.
The <fen>Source</fen> is the starting point of the trip.

The <fen>Mode_of_transportation</fen> expresses how the motion of the <fen>Traveler</fen> is effected, by their body or by a vehicle which holds and conveys the <fen>Traveler</fen>. Vehicles can move in any way and in any medium. They are usually expressed obliquely with 'in' or 'by'.
The direction in which the <fen>Traveler</fen> goes.
When the traveling occurs.
The <fen>Place</fen> is the location of the motion. It describes the area in which motion (with a specified <fen>Source</fen>, <fen>Path</fen> or <fen>Goal</fen>) takes place.
An <fen>Agent</fen> prepares for an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Activity</fen> for which an <fen>Agent</fen> is preparing.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> at which an <fen>Agent</fen> prepares for an <fen>Activity</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Place</fen> where an <fen>Agent</fen> prepares for an <fen>Activity</fen>.
The individual that controls the value of a <fen>Feature</fen>.
The part of the complex entity which is changed in the process of adjusting.
The <fen>Feature</fen> with respect to which the <fen>Part</fen> is adjusted.
The time at which the adjusting occurs.
The location where the adjusting takes place.
This Frame Element marks constituents expressing the entity that is judged to be more or less suitable for some <fen>Purpose</fen> or <fen>User</fen>.
This Frame Element marks constituents that express the <fen>Purpose</fen> for which the <fen>Evaluee</fen> is judged to be suitable or unsuitable.
This role marks expressions that indicate a <fen>User</fen> to whom
The individual that manipulates the <fen>Instrument</fen> to enable interaction with the <fen>Targeted</fen>.
The <fen>Targeted</fen> is the entity located in an indirectly accessible location relative to the <fen>Agent</fen>.
The object manipulated by the <fen>Agent</fen> in order to interact with the <fen>Targeted</fen>.
The location that the <fen>Agent</fen> wishes to ready the <fen>Instrument</fen> to access.
The <fen>Activity</fen> is undertaken by the <fen>Agent</fen> and is directed towards the <fen>Targeted</fen> or <fen>Target_location</fen>.
This role identifies the <fen>Time</fen> when the <fen>Agent</fen> takes aim.
The place where the <fen>Agent</fen> aims at the <fen>Targeted</fen>.
listRoleExamples: The ICBL has prioritised <fex>working to achieve universalisation of the Mine Ban Treaty in South Asia by 2004</fex>.
Dell said Friday <fex>the company</fex> will put more emphasis on selling software
Monophysite Christians  emphasized Christ's divinity <fex>over his humanity</fex>.
Water is a scarce commodity on French Island so <fex>the guest house</fex> places strong emphasis on water conservation.
<fex>In the 1960s</fex> Foucault placed great weight on the notion of archeology.
<fex>In Arizona</fex> we emphasize western bats with a special focus on species identification.
Barney used to travel <fex>by bus </fex> a lot
She adjusted <fex>the injectors</fex> to make the mixture leaner.
She adjusted <fex>the temperature of the oven</fex> so that the pie crust would brown a little.
Being a project leader is not a job for which <fex>everybody</fex> is suited.
We need to plan more buildings suitable <fex>for disabled people</fex>.
I tried to target <fex>his left thigh</fex> .
If you target <fex>towards the bridge</fex> , make sure to avoid the church .
<fex>The attack</fex> targeted a village south of here.
